articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Malian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Malian President
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, on Dec. 16 last year received a message of greeting from Ibrahim Boubacar Keita, Malian president.
					 The Malian president in his message said that he deems it pleasure to most sincerely wish Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people prosperity on the occasion of the New Year on behalf of the Malian people and on his own behalf.
					
					 He expressed the belief that 2014 would see successes in achieving world peace, solidarity and progress thanks to concerted efforts of the two countries.
					
					 He extended highest regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Deals with Angry S. Korean Public Mindset
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Deals with Angry S. Korean Public Mindset 
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for Peaceful Reunification of Korea on Friday issued information bulletin No. 1057 dealing with the angry public mindset in south Korea.
					 It said: "How are you" has become a popular phrase symbolic of the anti-"government" public mindset. 
					
					 A wall-paper was displayed at Korea University, which carried the question "How are you" and the answer "Not fine." This sparked off a campaign of displaying similar wall papers. It is rapidly spreading among people of different social standings including university students, high school students, employees, housewives and even among Koreans overseas. 
					
					 Such wall papers are seen on the walls of major buildings and public places. Internet websites are deluged with such words as "The president is only fine, but the people are not fine," "We are not safe owing to the revival of yusin dictatorship," etc. 
					
					 This shows mounting curses and resentment of south Koreans from different social standings against the puppet conservative group which turned south Korea into a veritable hell. 
					
					 The familiar greeting "How are you" has become a phrase critical of the authorities in south Korea. It is something unprecedented not only in the world history but in the history of the preceding regimes in south Korea. 
					
					 The puppet regime promised an "era of people's happiness" before coming to power. But what it brought the south Korean people is nothing but misfortune and despair. 
					
					 The fate of the south Korean people hinges on how the north-south relations are repaired. 
					
					 It is quite clear that the south Korean people can neither live in peace nor escape a war disaster unless an end is put to the confrontation with fellow countrymen and frantic war moves. 
					
					 The anger of the south Korean people is on the point of eruption. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should lend an ear to the voices of all Koreans demanding independence, democracy and national reunification and stop at once their unpopular rule, fascist suppression, confrontation and war moves.

articles.title: This Year's First Friday Labor Done
articles.content:
This Year's First Friday Labor Done
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Employees of ministries and national institutions did the first Friday labor this year on Jan. 10.
					 They prepared 2 300 tons of quality compost and lots of farm materials in a short span of time.
					
					 Officials of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ministry of Metal Industry, Ministry of Coal Industry, Ministry of Land and Environment Protection and other units went to the Wollo Vegetable Farm in Mangyongdae District with truck loads of compost and spent a meaningful day for the preparations of farming for this year.
					
					 Employees of the State Planning Commission, Ministry of Railways, Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport, Ministry of Fisheries and other units carpeted with compost the fields of Rihyon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Sadong District.
					
					 Those of the Secretariat of the Cabinet, Ministry of Electric Power Industry, Ministry of Commerce, Ministry of Public Health and various other units did Friday labor at the Ryuhyon Vegetable Co-op Farm in Ryokpho District.

articles.title: Gravity-fed Drinking Water Service Established in Wonsan City
articles.content:
Gravity-fed Drinking Water Service Established in Wonsan City
						
 Wonsan, January 10 (KCNA) -- A gravity-fed drinking water service was established in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province.
					 The completion of the project made it possible to sufficiently supply clean drinking water not only to families but institutions, industrial establishments and other units in the city without using water pumps and electric motors.
					
					 The service was designed in such a way as to supply the water flowing from deep mountains even to high-rising buildings in the city.
					
					 The project for building a waterway tunnel was carried out through the introduction of efficient work methods. It was immediately followed by the project for widening the tunnel and covering its inside with concrete.
					
					 Projects for setting up poles in dozens of places and laying great many water pipes were also wound up in a brief span of time.
					
					 The construction of a filter-bed basin and a water reservoir was successfully completed, contributing to qualitatively winding up the overall projects earlier than scheduled as required by technical norms.

articles.title: Schoolchildren's New Year Performance Goes On
articles.content:
Schoolchildren's New Year Performance Goes On
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The schoolchildren's New Year performance is going on here. Among the numbers is the play "Miraculous Medicine", which shows the medical service of the Okryu Children's Hospital built here.
					 The play tells a story about a little girl who was recovered from her incurable disease at the Okryu Children's Hospital.
					
					 When she looks around the hospital, she is very surprised at its palatial appearance.
					
					 Seen in the hospital floored with high quality materials are cartoon pictures on its walls, colorful chandeliers, peculiar-shaped glass doors, etc.
					
					 What catch her eyes are well-equipped amusement facilities in indoor playground and indoor wading pool.
					
					 When she is carried away by them, a doctor tells her that children would feel themselves relieved from fears for medical treatment so as to actively respond to the treatment.
					
					 The play draws big applauds from the audience.
					
					 Han Sol Song, living in Rangnang District, Pyongyang, told KCNA that the best medicine for our children is nothing but the loving care shown by the Workers' Party of Korea for children.

articles.title: Entire Korean Nation, Driving Force for National Reunification
articles.content:
Entire Korean Nation, Driving Force for National Reunification 
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- There is nothing more important for the Korean nation than achieving national reunification.
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address said that the driving force for national reunification is all the members of the Korean nation in the north, in the south and abroad.
					
					 The Korean nation is the homogeneous one of the same blood and same language that has lived on the same land for thousands of years.
					
					 The national division, forced by outside forces, has inflicted all sorts of sufferings upon the Korean people for nearly 70 years, endangering their homogeneity as the same nation. For this reason, it is most urgent for the Korean nation to reunify the country.
					
					 Therefore, it is quite natural for all Koreans to be masters of the reunification movement.
					
					 The national reunification is a pan-national struggle to put an end to domination and interference of outside forces and defending the national sovereignty.
					
					 From olden times, the Korean nation has pooled strength, courage and wisdom in the struggle for defending the national sovereignty. So, it is intolerable shame for them to see its sovereignty is infringed upon by outside forces.
					
					 There is no one to bring the reunification of the country on the Korean nation.
					
					 The driving force for Korea's reunification is the Korean nation itself and the reunification issue should be settled independently as desired by the Korean people.
					
					 The June 15 reunification era proved that only when all the Koreans turn out in the struggle for national reunification, keenly aware of their responsibility for it, can they bring earlier the day of reunification.
					
					 All the Korean people in the north, the south and abroad should get united close in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself to strengthen the driving force for national reunification and further enhance its might.

articles.title: Construction Workers Inspired by New Year Address
articles.content:
Construction Workers Inspired by New Year Address
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, said in his New Year Address that construction is an important front for solidifying the foundations of a thriving country and creating bases for the people's happy life.
					 Encouraged by the address, construction workers in the country are now fully determined to open up a new heyday in construction. 
					
					 In recent years a lot of monumental edifices symbolic of the Songun (military-first) era have been built in different parts of the country.
					
					 All the edifices were designed to meet the people's emotion and aesthetic feelings, which are flawless in their ideological and artistic value as well as their utility.
					
					 The construction has been put on a higher industrial basis with modern construction equipment and tools.
					
					 Last year, Kim Jong Un sent to the officials and workers in the field of construction workers the historic letter "Let Us Usher in the Period of Great Prosperity in Construction by Thoroughly Embodying Party's Idea on Juche-based Architecture".
					
					 In the letter, he praised them as scouts and pioneers with the honorable duty to take the lead in paving a way for prosperity of Songun Korea and happiness of people, expressing his deep trust in them.
					
					 In hearty response to the New Year Address, service personnel and builders are making innovations in major projects, including the dormitory of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill and the cascade power stations along the River Chongchon.
					
					 The builders are employing advanced construction methods to suit specific features of each project.
					
					 The Sangwon Cement Complex, Pyongyang Plastic Building-materials Factory, Pyongyang Timber Mill and other building-materials factories are boosting the production of cement, precast concrete parts and building parts.
					
					 Officials in the Ministry of Construction and Building-Materials Industry have also turned out in materializing the Workers' Party of Korea's grand plan on construction.

articles.title: Peace Guarantees National Reunification, Prosperity
articles.content:
Peace Guarantees National Reunification, Prosperity
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the DPRK, stressed in his New Year Address that it is an important task facing the movement for Korea's reunification to defend national security and peace.
					 The struggle for peace is a patriotic one of justice for protecting the base of the Korean nation's life as well as a common cause of the nation for its security, independent development and prosperity.
					
					 Peace is more valuable for the Korean nation that has lived in constant danger of a war, suffering from outsiders' threat of aggression for decades. Without defending peace, is it impossible to realize the peaceful reunification of the country and achieve the development and prosperity common to the nation through reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					 Korea's reunification means reconnecting the broken vein of the nation and achieving national harmony, and a war can never bring any progress in settling the reunification issue.
					
					 It is clear to everyone that any accidental conflict between the north and the south of Korea may lead to an all-out war as the two sides stand in military confrontation with each other. Should another war break out on the Korean Peninsula, it will result in a deadly nuclear catastrophe, reducing south Korea to ashes, and the United States will never be safe.
					
					 Peaceful environment is also needed for smooth progress in the reconciliation and cooperation projects between the north and the south of Korea, as taught by the history of inter-Korean relations and national reunification movement.
					
					 All Koreans should turn out in a nationwide struggle for peace, irrespective of party affiliation and political grouping, and decisively check any confrontation and war moves of the bellicose forces at home and abroad, mindful that the destiny of the nation depends on protecting peace.

articles.title: Papers Editorially Call for Steady Victories under Banner of Single-minded Unity
articles.content:
Papers Editorially Call for Steady Victories under Banner of Single-minded Unity 
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Friday editorially call for winning steady victories in the new year's worthwhile onward movement the under the unfurled banner of single-minded unity. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 Now the service personnel and people of the DPRK renew their pledge of loyalty to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu, the cause of Songun revolution, under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is the prominent leader who takes care of all the people and glorifies the history and tradition of single-minded unity of the Korean revolution, carrying forward the intention of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 By having Kim Jong Un at their helm, the ranks of the Korean revolution have grown stronger to be units of comrades, units of comrades-in-arms, who share their destiny with him on the road of the revolution, which should be taken despite rain or snow and  the ever-victorious history and tradition have been given steady continuity.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK means an organized integral whole, ideologically pure one and perfect unity in action as the leader, service personnel and people share thought, intention, fate and future. It is unbreakable unity and cohesion. 
					
					 Unshakable is the will of the Workers' Party of Korea, army and people to glorify the Korean revolution as the lineage of Mt. Paektu down through generations and dynamically advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the unfurled banner of single-minded unity. 
					
					 As the leader and all the service personnel and people have become a harmonious whole, the DPRK will work such miracles as racing against the time and successfully realize all dreams and ideals of the people. 
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the people to energetically speed up advance in the new year, fully confident of victory, and once again demonstrate before the whole world the national power of the country shining with the august name of the sun.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Adhering to Stand of By Our Nation Itself
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Adhering to Stand of By Our Nation Itself
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article calls for rejecting the interference of foreign forces and firmly adhering to the stand of By Our Nation Itself in the national reunification movement.
					 As the issue of the national reunification is in essence the one related with the national sovereignty, nobody can find fault with the Koreans' efforts to reject foreign forces' interference and settle the issue of the national reunification by their concerted efforts, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 In order to achieve the reunification of the country independently, the foreign forces should not be allowed to interfere in the issue of reunification.
					
					 The U.S. bisected the Korean nation prompted by its interests in aggression.
					
					 The U.S. ambition to perpetuate Korea's division and put under its control the whole of Korea will never change just like the leopard does not change his spots. The interference of foreign forces is a major obstacle lying in the way to the reconciliation, unity and reunification of the nation.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want the peace and reunification, they should abandon their anachronistic policy of relying on foreign forces which is harmful to the inter-Korean relations but maintain the principle of national independence and take the stand of By Our Nation Itself. The north and the south already affirmed the principle of national independence through the three principles of national reunification and the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should respect the principle of independence on which the north and the south agreed and show their positive attitude of rejecting the interference of foreign forces and settling the inter-Korean relations from the stand of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 The DPRK will make positive efforts to achieve the national reunification, peace and prosperity by firmly maintaining the stand of By Our Nation Itself in future, too.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Disturbing Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Disturbing Peace
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The results of the poll conducted by a U.S. opinion poll research institute at the end of last year made it clearer that the  U.S. is chiefly to blame for threatening peace in the world, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 When 68 000 people of 68 countries were asked to answer the question "Which country is the biggest threat to global peace?" many respondents said the U.S. is the biggest threat to the world peace. The article goes on: The U.S. is apt to assert that it should ensure global pace in a responsible manner. But this is no more than rhetoric intended to cover its aggressive nature and attain its hegemonic purpose with ease.
					
					 "Peace" touted by the U.S. is a pronoun of aggression, war and interference.
					
					 Under that pretext the U.S. has perpetrated wars of aggression and armed intervention, harassing international peace order and imposing unspeakable misfortune and disaster on people. The countries, which fell victim to its wars of aggression and interference in their internal affairs, are without exception thrown into serious social chaos and disorder and their economies go bankrupt. Tribal and sectarian conflicts and disputes among political forces have reached to such an uncontrollable phase that whole society turned into a pandemonium.
					
					 Military and political standoff is getting serious among countries in the regions to which the U.S. stretched its tentacles of aggression. In a word, there is no tranquil place in the countries and regions exposed to the U.S. interference.
					
					 Its interference and war moves have gone into extremes on the Korean Peninsula, threatening the sovereignty of independent states and existence of humankind. The situation on the peninsula remained so tense last year that a war might break out there any moment.
					
					 The U.S. should stop such reckless military moves reminiscent of a guilty party filing the suit first, well aware of how the international community approaches it.

articles.title: Japan's Official Apology and Reparation Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Japan's Official Apology and Reparation Demanded in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1108th Wednesday rally outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Jan. 8 in demand of the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for Imperial Japanese Army.
					 At the rally speakers said that 22 years have passed since the start of the struggle demanding the solution to the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army but the issue has not yet been settled.
					
					 Many Korean women whose chastity had been mercilessly violated by the Japanese imperialists left this world with their grudge unsettled and survivors are still undergoing pain but the Japanese government has refused to make even apology, they deplored, adding:
					
					 A whole string of vituperations justifying the sexual slavery are heard from Japan and war criminals are extolled through visits to Yasukuni Shrine.
					
					 They demanded the Japanese government admit the past crimes and make apology and reparation for them as early as possible and urged the present regime to take positive measures to ensure that Japan honestly come out for settling the above-said issue.
					
					 South Koreans will stage positive actions to build a reunified, peaceful world free from war so that their descendants may not suffer damage and pain again, they declared.
					
					 A statement was read out at the rally.
					
					 The statement vehemently condemned Japan for working hard to distort history and revive militarism far from implementing the just demands for the settlement of the above-said issue such as admission of the crimes related to sexual slavery, official apology and legal reparation for them and punishment of war criminals.

articles.title: KCTU Stages Large-scale Anti-"government" Action
articles.content:
KCTU Stages Large-scale Anti-"government" Action 
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- More than 20 000 members of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) staged the second anti-"government" action in Seoul and other parts of south Korea on Thursday. 
					 Sin Sung Chol, chairman of the KCTU, at the rally held at Seoul Square declared workers would become permanent slaves unless they fight against the present "government," which tramples down their right to existence. 
					
					 He called for dynamic actions to punish the present "government" keen to sell public sectors to the plutocrats. 
					
					 The KCTU will launch the third action across south Korea on Jan. 18 and go on a general strike for the resignation of the regime, frustration of the suppression of the labor movement and a halt to privatization in connection with the lapse of a year since Park Geun Hye's coming to power, he added. 
					
					 Earlier, the headquarters for general strike of the KCTU held a meeting on Tuesday at which it declared there is nothing to expect from the present regime hell-bent on the suppression of the labor movement. 
					
					 The former central executive members of the KCTU held a meeting in Seoul on Wednesday at which they denounced Park Geun Hye for revealing her attempt to push ahead with privatization of public sectors at her New Year press conference.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Suppress Railway Trade Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Suppress Railway Trade Union 
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Supreme Prosecutor's Office applied for issuing warrants of arrest for eight leading members of the Railway Trade Union, according to CBS of south Korea on Jan. 8.
					 Earlier, the south Korean police arrested 22 out of 35 unionists for whom warrants of arrest had been issued and detained two of them.
					
					  In the meantime, the security authorities are busy with a repressive racket, threatening to arrest without delay at least 10 leading members on a want list and take a legal action against them.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime is working with bloodshot eyes to revive the "yusin" dictatorship, brutally clamping down on actions of workers for their vital rights.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's New Year Press Conference Decried
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's New Year Press Conference Decried
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean media termed the New Year press conference held by the puppet chief executive as the one characterized by her arrogance and self-complacency.
					 Her New Year press conference was absolutely disappointing as she repeated her previous self-righteous stand only, far from repenting on causing social chaos, said an editorial of Kyunghyang Daily News on Jan. 6.
					
					 As for the issue of the Intelligence Service's interference in the election, she avoided trouble by saying "let's drop time-consuming contention". As for the controversy over the distortion of history in textbooks she described it as "dispute of isms", and termed it groundless "Left-inclined" argument, evading direct answer to the issue of the textbooks which justified sycophancy and dictatorship. 
					
					 Internet newspaper Voice of People in an editorial on Jan. 7 said the New Year press conference disclosed her intent not to seek any understanding with the people in the future, either.
					
					 History called as dictators those "presidents" who refused to share understanding with those with differing thinking and stand, the editorial said. It ridiculed the chief executive, saying if she really opts for this road.
					
					 Hankuk Ilbo in an editorial on the same day criticized the chief executive, saying at the press conference she trumpeted about "strictly countering illegal strike".
					
					 CBS on Jan. 6 deplored the chaotic political situation, saying that this situation is likely to continue by the chief executive.

articles.title: Conservative Forces' Move to Distort History Has Gone Bust in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conservative Forces' Move to Distort History Has Gone Bust in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean newspaper Hangyore on Tuesday in an editorial said that the move of the puppet conservative forces to distort history has gone bust. 
					 The editorial recalled that the distorted history textbook written by conservative scholars was rejected at schools. 
					
					 It means that the conservative textbook met rebuff and frustration at schools for beautifying pro-Japanese acts and military dictatorship and falsifying historical facts, the editorial noted, and continued: 
					
					 The conservative forces labeled the contemporary history textbook published by the Gold Star Publishing House of south Korea in 2003 "Left-inclined," sparking off a history war which has lasted more than a decade. Finally, the conservative forces knelt down before the people and suffered a heavy defeat. 
					
					 Actions against the conservative forces' moves to impose the distorted textbook upon students are now under way at many schools. 
					
					 It is a noteworthy event that the people won actions staged in demand of the cancellation of the distorted history textbook, saying there is no future for the nation that forgot history.

articles.title: Elimination of Sycophantic Traitors Called for
articles.content:
Elimination of Sycophantic Traitors Called for
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The internet paper of Koreans in the U.S. Minjok Thongsin carried a poem created by a Korean in Germany which called upon people to turn out to eliminate the sycophantic treacherous forces and achieve the independent reunification of Korea. 
					 The poem said that sycophantic traitors, stooges faithful to the U.S. and Japan, hurl innocent people to battlefields while lording it over south Korea, which turned into a colony of outsiders.
					
					 The present south Korean regime is fascist dictatorial and illegal one which seized power through fraudulent election in which the power organs including the Intelligence Service, Patriots and Veterans Affairs Agency and Defense Ministry were involved, and trample down the rights of the people including the right to existence, the poem said, adding:
					
					 It is necessary to settle accounts with the pro-Japanese and pro-American sycophantic traitors who even distort history of the nation, and achieve the independent reunification of the country. 
					
					 Let all Koreans get united and actively turn out in the efforts for implementing the June 15 joint declaration between the north and the south.

articles.title: Overseas Korean Creates Poem, Words of Song in Praise of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Overseas Korean Creates Poem, Words of Song in Praise of Kim Jong Un 
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Ri Jun Sik, chairman of the European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, made public a poem and words of song in reverence for Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					 In his poem "Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Give Blessing" Ri said that Koreans are confident of independent reunification of the country and powerful Korea thanks to Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, who bears close resemblance to the guts and bravery of Mt. Paektu from where Tangun Korea, Songun revolution and unified Korea originated.
					
					 Thanks to Kim Jong Un, Songun Korea, a highly civilized Korea backed by latest science and technology, shines as independent country standing firm against imperialism being looked up by all people of the world, Ri said. 
					
					 He added that Kim Jong Un is being blessed by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il from the sky above Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution. 
					
					 In the words of song "Kim Jong Un, Our Hope" he said that the embrace of the Workers' Party of Korea is the cradle of happiness and the embrace of the great Generalissimos and that it is exactly the embrace of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It also said that led by Kim Jong Un, great heart and hope of all people, the DPRK is advancing along the righteous road of independence and the world is advancing along the road of peace against imperialism and war.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Czech Republic
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Czech Republic
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by the Petr Hrt Publishing House of the Czech Republic on January 3.
					 The work, a speech made by him at the military parade for celebrating the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to exalt the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced by Bangladeshi Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced by Bangladeshi Organization
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The main contents of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address this year were carried by the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee in its bulletin on January 4.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Personages of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Personages of DR Congo 
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Personages of DR Congo released statements on January 2 and 3 in support of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Democratic Congo and chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, said that the New Year Address reflects the unshakable will of Kim Jong Un to hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Korea and build the best country, a thriving socialist nation on the land of the DPRK in line with their idea and desire.
					
					 He stressed that the New Year Address helped people know better about the high political caliber of Kim Jong Un and harden the conviction that the DPRK will advance along the road of socialism chosen by itself to the last as a guardian of global peace.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo noted that the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un which calls for bringing about miracles and innovations in all fabrics of society under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism instills confidence in victory and optimism into all Korean people.
					
					 The chairman stressed that prosperity of the Korean nation is guaranteed when the New Year Address is thoroughly carried out.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Various Countries
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Seminar, reading session and round-table talks on supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address were held in Switzerland, Bangladesh, Benin and Ethiopia from Jan. 1 to 4.
					 Present there were figures of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism and Kimjongilism, the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin and the Waterway Project Construction Enterprise, the Waterway Project Designing and Supervising Enterprise and hospitals of Ethiopia and masses there.
					
					 The chief of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers in the report and speeches expressed belief that the army and people of the DPRK would thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address and make fresh achievements in the work to open up a period of prosperity of Songun Korea, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy said Kim Jong Un called on all Korean people to strive for greater victory in the new year, filled with high ambition and unwavering confidence and firmly united behind the Workers' Party of Korea with a single heart.
					
					 The chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea noted with admiration that the laudable successes made by the DPRK last year were ascribable to the heroic struggle waged by the Korean people with strong will to build a thriving socialist country without fail under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The manager and vice manager of the Waterway Project Construction Enterprise in Ethiopia said the Korean people could traverse the road of victory even under the complicated situation last year entirely thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of Juche Idea Study Committee Held in DR Congo
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of Juche Idea Study Committee Held in DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo held an annual meeting on Dec. 28 last year.
					 Present there were the chairman, secretary general and members of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, figures of the Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Association for Implementing the Juche Philosophy, the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of University of Kinshasa in DR Congo.
					
					 The annual meeting reviewed the work of the national committee in 2013 and discussed its working plan for 2014.
					
					 In his report Chairman Rohekele Andre referred to the successes made in the work of the national committee in 2013 to study and disseminate Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and works of supreme leader Kim Jong Un and in the activities to expand the number of the Juche idea followers.
					
					 The participation in major events held on significant days in the DPRK such as celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, the meeting held to hear a report on the visit to the DPRK and the African regional seminar on "The Juche Idea and Lesson for Independent Change in Africa" helped people of DR Congo deepen understanding of the truth and vitality of the Juche idea, he said.
					
					 He underscored the need to conduct diverse and wide-ranging activities to study and disseminate the Juche idea through the newly opened website of the national committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Praised by British Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Praised by British Personage
						
 Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, posted an article on its website on Dec. 24 last year to mark the 2nd anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Noting Kim Jong Un is highly respected and revered by the progressives as another great commander of Mt. Paektu and iron-willed brilliant commander, the article said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un has demonstrated his superb commanding art as a brilliant commander for the past two years.
					
					 After assuming heavy responsibility as supreme commander of the KPA, he evinced his firm will to successfully carry forward the Songun revolutionary cause of leader Kim Jong Il while inspecting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105 Tank Division of the KPA on Jan. 1, 2012.
					
					 When visiting the biggest hotspot areas several times, he ordered service personnel to deal a telling counter-blow at the enemies once they provoke and lead it to a great war for national reunification.
					
					 Giving accounts of the fact that he led all service personnel and people to counter the offensive of the U.S. and other forces kowtowing to it to stifle the DPRK with resolute counter-measures when the U.S. intensified sanctions upon the DPRK by finding fault with the latter's successful launch of the satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and the third underground nuclear test, the article continued:
					
					 The DPRK's toughest reaction and resolute revolutionary stand against imperialism set a great example in the showdown with the U.S.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, who makes U.S. imperialism and other world reactionaries tremble with fear to merely hear his august name, is the supreme commander of not only the army and people of the DPRK but also the world anti-imperialist revolutionary forces and iron-willed invincible commander who has successfully carried forward the Songun revolutionary cause of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Funcionarios de RPDC realizan primer trabajo de viernes de este ano
articles.content:
Funcionarios de RPDC realizan primer trabajo de viernes de este ano
						
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- Los funcionarios de ministerios y organos centrales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea realizaron el dia 10 en las llanuras cooperativas el primer trabajo de viernes de este ano.
					En un corto plazo, ellos prepararon mas de 2 mil 300 toneladas de estiercol y muchos materiales agricolas.
					
					Los funcionarios del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, el Ministerio de Industria Metalurgica, el de Industria Carbonifera, el de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental y otras unidades acudieron a la Granja Especializada en Verduras de Wollo del capitalino municipio de Mangyongdae con camiones cargados de estiercol.
					
					Los otros del Comite Estatal de Planificacion, el Ministerio del Ferrocarril, el Ministerio de Transporte Terrestre y Maritimo, el Ministerio de Industria Pesquera y otras trabajaron en la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Rihyon del capitalino municipio de Sadong.
					
					En la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Ryuhyon del municipio de Ryokpho laboraron los funcionarios del Secretariado del Consejo de Ministros, los Ministerios de Industria Electrica, de Comercio y de Salud Publica, etc.

articles.title: CRPP publica informacion no. 1057
articles.content:
CRPP publica informacion no. 1057
						
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- En estos dias, en el Sur de Corea esta de moda la salutacion "?Como esta?" como simbolo de la opinion publica antigubernamental.
					Al respecto, el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 10 la informacion no.1057.
					
					Hace poco, en el mural de la Universidad Koryo del Sur de Corea aparecio la respuesta "No estoy bien" a la pregunta de "?Como esta?". 
					
					Desde entonces, la campana de colocacion de la tabla con la misma pregunta se extiende rapido entre los universitarios, los alumnos de escuelas superiores, los civiles, las amas de casa y otros sectores de la sociedad surcoreana asi como a ultramar, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Ese saludo esta pegado tambien en las paredes de edificios importantes y los lugares publicos mientras en Internet se desbordan las contestaciones como "La presidenta esta bien, pero el pueblo no" y "Estamos intranquilos porque se resucita la dictadura de Yusin (renovacion)".
					
					El hecho demuestra a que grado llegan la maldicion y la indignacion de los habitantes surcoreanos por la banda titere conservadora que convirtio el suelo surcoreano en un infierno.
					
					"Como esta", palabra de salutacion carinosa  entre las personas, se hizo un termino de lucha contra las autoridades, hecho nunca visto en los "poderes" anteriores del Sur de Corea.
					
					Cuando tomo el poder, la banda surcoreana prometio la "epoca de felicidad del pueblo", pero, lo que le dio realmente fue la "desgracia" y la "desesperacion".
					
					La estabilidad de habitantes surcoreanos esta relacionado directamente con las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Resulta obvio que en medio de confrontacion fratricida y maniobras militares, ellos no estaran bien ni podran evitar los desastres de guerra.
					
					La opinion publica del Sur de Corea esta a punto de explosion.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben escuchar bien las voces del pueblo y todos los compatriotas, que reclaman la independencia, la democracia y la reunificacion de la patria, y poner punto final a su infame gobernacion antipopular, represion fascista, campana de confrontacion y maniobras belicas.

articles.title: Periodicos llaman a lograr victorias con unidad monolitica
articles.content:
Periodicos llaman a lograr victorias con unidad monolitica
						
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- En sendos editoriales divulgados este viernes, los periodicos capitalinos dieron enfasis en que todos deben lograr siempre victorias bajo la bandera de unidad monolitica en la marcha del Ano Nuevo.
					Ahora, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea redoblan la decision de llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, iniciada en el monte Paektu bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, adelanta el diario Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					El Mariscal es dirigente extraordinario que al continuar el proposito de los grandes hombres del monte Paektu, abraza a todo el pueblo del pais y sigue escribiendo la historia y la tradicion de unidad monolitica de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Gracias a el, las filas revolucionarias se hicieron el destacamento de camaradas y companeros de armas que comparten la vida y hasta la muerte en el arduo camino de la revolucion.
					
					La unidad monolitica de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se caracteriza por la integridad organizativa, la pureza ideologica y la identidad de accion.
					
					Segun ella, el lider y todos los militares y civiles comparten la idea, la voluntad y el destino forjando juntos el futuro.
					
					Es inconmovible la conviccion revolucionaria del partido, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea de continuar de generacion en generacion la revolucion coreana con el linaje sanguineo del monte Paektu y avanzar sin vacilacion alguna por el camino de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo levantando en alto la bandera de unidad monolitica.
					
					Gracias a esa unidad entre el lider y todo el ejercito y pueblo, el pueblo coreano realizara sin falta todos sus suenos e ideales creando sin cesar los milagros.
					
					El periodico Minju Joson exhorta a todos a  apretar la marcha del Ano Nuevo con la conviccion en la victoria para demostrar a todo el mundo el poderio de la patria que brilla con los nombres de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
